page.title: 19ATTITUDES.PEOPLE & OPINIONS.
page.content: We asked 100 families in{Eastern Grn about their employment. There were 215 adults eligible to work in the motor industry. 57 have at some time worked in the industry, now there are only 17. Eastern Grn. residents use their local shops in Sutton Ave.several times a week but use supermarkets at Cannon Park or in Coventry city for most shopping.Many people like Eastern Grn.because it is both near the countryside & the city. Villagers living in{Berkswell}like the friendliness & quietness.The Post Office & shop is used by most at sometime.The supermarkets at Cannon Park, Coventry are often used as there is more variety & goods are cheaper. Only 45 attend Sunday services at St John's.The Rector is involved with the village school & also visits the sick.
